name: Creative Art Exploration
description: Come have some fun in this ultimate creative arts class which combines both imagination and inspiration from real-world images. Class includes inventing imaginary scenes, creating intricate abstract works of art, and making the mundane extraordinary using both drawing and painting techniques. This class aids in the development of visual art skills, which can help prepare students for entering visual arts high schools and beyond.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
